description: Pensieve hooks: PostToolUse syncs project SKILL graph after user-data edits.

hooks.command: bash -lc 'root="${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT:-}"; [[ -n "$root" ]] || exit 0; if [[ "${root:1:1}" == ":" && "${root:0:1}" =~ [A-Za-z] ]]; then if command -v cygpath >/dev/null 2>&1; then root="$(cygpath -u "$root")"; else drive="${root:0:1}"; rest="${root:2}"; rest="${rest//\\//}"; drive="$(printf "%s" "$drive" | tr "A-Z" "a-z")"; root="/$drive$rest"; fi; fi; exec "$root/hooks/sync-project-skill-graph.sh"'
